lead_paragraph: Donald Trump and Univision said that they had resolved the lawsuit that Mr. Trump filed after the broadcaster decided not to broadcast the Miss Universe and Miss USA pageants.

headline.print_headline: Trump and Univision Settle Suit Over Pageant Broadcasts
headline.main: Trump and Univision Settle Suit Over Pageant Broadcasts

snippet: Donald Trump and Univision said that they had resolved the lawsuit that Mr. Trump filed after the broadcaster decided not to broadcast the Miss Universe and Miss USA pageants.
abstract: Donald J Trump settles his $500 million lawsuit against Univision for undisclosed terms; suit was filed in 2015 after Spanish-language network said it would not broadcast two Trump-owned beauty pageants due to insults about Mexico made by Republican presidential candidate.
